markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs=""
>
[Resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 581 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Resilient_ runes imbue armor with additional protective magic. This grants the wearer a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

 You can upgrade the _resilient_ rune already etched on a suit of armor to a stronger version, increasing the values of the existing rune to those of the new rune. You must have the formula of the stronger rune to do so, and the Price of the upgrade is the difference between the two runes’ Prices.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title

pfs="Standard"
>
Resilient (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 3,440 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The armor grants a +2 item bonus to saving throws.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 20"
pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The armor grants a +3 item bonus to saving throws.
name: Resilient (Major)
